headline: ServiceNow (NOW) Gets Initiated With a Neutral Rating by Macquarie

headline: ServiceNow (NOW): Exploring Valuation Perspectives After Recent Share Price Decline
summary: ServiceNow (NOW) shares have lost ground in recent weeks, closing at $802.72 after declining nearly 12% over the past month. Investors are starting to look beyond daily price swings and are considering what these moves could mean for the company's long-term story. See our latest analysis for ServiceNow. ServiceNow’s share price has taken a sizable hit recently, but this follows a much stronger multi-year run. Its total shareholder return over three years still sits at an impressive 94%. While...
